content:
# The search for resources was successful. 
# I found the nearest coal resource at position (22.5, -14.5) and the nearest iron ore resource at position (-16.5, 25.5). 
# I will now proceed to gather some coal first, as it is often used for initial power generation.

# 2. Move to the coal resource position and gather some coal. 
# I will specify the amount of coal I want to gather.

move_to(coal_position)  # Move to the coal resource position
gather(Resource.Coal, amount=10)  # Gather 10 units of coal
print(f'Gathered coal from position: {coal_position}')  # Confirm gathering action
